price: Gammachiisaafi sodaachisaa ta’ee (buufamee dha); irra hedduun isaanii irraa gara galan. Isaan hin dhagayan.
arabic: بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا فَأَعۡرَضَ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: bashīran wanadhīran fa-aʿraḍa aktharuhum fahum lā yasmaʿūna
